name: 李來春
objective: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, methods and techniques, technical support and application. Course also incorporates case studies, company visits and exhibitions relevant to interaction design to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.
schedule:
W1 Introduction to the course 
W2 First principles of interaction design-user experience
W3 First principles of interaction design-user experience
W4 Interaction design VS Human-computer interface – Dialogue with computer  
W5 Human factors of human-computer interface
W6 Human-computer interface usability
W7 Human-computer interface user experience design
W8 Interaction design VS Exhibition technology - Interactive exhibition of the infinite charm of technology 
W9 Mid-term report
W10  Analysis and Research on Applied Exhibition Design
W11  Analysis of performance design
W12  Interactive application analysis
W13  Application of super exhibition design
W14  Interaction design VS Digital learning- The future trend of interactive learning
W15  Digital learning under the evolution of interactive technology
W16  Interactive digital learning techniques and tools
W17  Application cases of interactive digital learning
W18  Final term-group report
scorePolicy:
Attendance 25%
Mid-term report 35%
Final term-group report 40%
materials: Lai-chung Lee, Hsiao-yue Tsao, Chun-Ching Chen (2018), Introduction to Interaction Design, Taipei: Chuan Hwa Book Co., Ltd.
